messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Can all personel please come to the conference room

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to some troubles in logistics we will just bluespace the parts to bridge but we are not bluespacing the machinery required you are on your own with that

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Solar Maintenance.
